description:
net: use host address resolver via cgo

Plan is for Lookup to replace
LookupHost and LookupPort.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change.

http://codereview.appspot.com/3623041/diff/2001/src/pkg/net/lookup_test.go
File src/pkg/net/lookup_test.go (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/3623041/diff/2001/src/pkg/net/lookup_test.go#newcode23
src/pkg/net/lookup_test.go:23: LookupTest{"tcp", ":echo", []string{":7"}, nil},
You can drop the LookupTest type on each of these lines.

http://codereview.appspot.com/3623041/diff/2001/src/pkg/net/srv_test.go
File src/pkg/net/srv_test.go (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/3623041/diff/2001/src/pkg/net/srv_test.go#newcode11
src/pkg/net/srv_test.go:11: //	"testing"
Are you sure you want the file to be committed like this?

I am much more interested in comments on
the API than on the code.  There are definitely
some details to work out before thinking about
submitting this.

Russ

subject: code review 3623041: net: use host address resolver via cgo
